ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): widget.View.Commands["CMD_CONFIRMAR"].Visible = widget.Entity.EhCOnfirmar() widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERAR"].Visible = widget.Entity.EstaEmCadastro() widget.View.Commands["CMD_RECUSAR"].Visible = widget.Entity.EhCOnfirmar() widget.View.Commands["CMD_ASSOCIARFILIAL"].Visible = widget.Entity.EstaEmCadastro() widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = widget.Entity.EhVencido() or widget.Entity.EhConfirmado() widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = widget.Entity.EstaEmCadastro() widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible
